price: 11. Ni farmoytiitik hebelto farmoytay keenih yamaate mayan kaal anqasak sugeenim akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
